modName: Red Eagle Sanctuary of the Reach
summary: A peaceful Forsworn enclave located in the Reach Hold that you can explore.
descriptionHtml:
I made this plugin for my game to add a little depth to a boring area in the Reach. I added a Dwemer ruin inhabited by the Bretons that were kicked out of Markarth. They are civilized and wear normal armor & clothing (though some do have facial tattoos). They do business with the Forsworn and anyone else that do not come to fight them. The Sanctuary is located right by "Deep Folk Crossing." It's got a map marker and you can fast travel.Â 

There is a Dwemer starter house for free; a mine that has gold & ebony ore; a large Dwemer underground area to explore; a smelter, workbench, tanning rack, forge, alchemy and enchanter.

This is a work in progress but very playable. The ruins & inhabitants will grow in time. Merchants, mine, Tavern & bed rental will be coming as time permits.

This plugin has been cleaned with TESVEdit.
Navmesh checked and follower friendly.

Installation........................................................................................................

NMM should work just fine.
Manual install: unzip and drop Mesh/Texture and ESP files in Data folder.

Any problem let me know.

Bugs: none I know of

Update 2.0-sanctuary size is increased even more and more NPC"s added. Gold & Edony mine added.

Credits:
The Nexus
Developers of TES V Edit
Bethesda
author: Gorky45
